code: export var ADD_NEW_RECIPE='ADD_NEW_RECIPE';export var SET_RECIPES='SET_RECIPES';export var SET_RECIPES_ALL='SET_RECIPES_ALL';export var CLEAR_REDUCER='CLEAR_REDUCER';export var STAR_RECIPE='STAR_RECIPE';export var SET_STARRED_RECIPES='SET_STARRED_RECIPES';export var SET_RECIPE_IMAGES='SET_RECIPE_IMAGES';export var addNewRecipeReducer=function addNewRecipeReducer(recipe){return{type:ADD_NEW_RECIPE,payload:recipe};};export var setRecipesWithAPI=function setRecipesWithAPI(recipes){return{type:SET_RECIPES,payload:recipes};};export var setRicepesReducer=function setRicepesReducer(data){return{type:SET_RECIPES_ALL,payload:data};};export var clearReducer=function clearReducer(){return{type:CLEAR_REDUCER};};export var starRecipeRecipeReducer=function starRecipeRecipeReducer(data){return{type:STAR_RECIPE,payload:data};};export var setStarredRecipes=function setStarredRecipes(payload){return{type:SET_STARRED_RECIPES,payload:payload};};export var setRecipeImages=function setRecipeImages(payload){return{type:SET_RECIPE_IMAGES,payload:payload};};
